thread.title: We hope to return.
thread.title_full: We hope to return. - Review of The Nadler Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lktraveler_10
title: We hope to return.
text:
Convenient, friendly and helpful staff, comfortable if small room, fine amenities (mini kitchenette, rubber mat for shower on request), and reasonable for London. No bar, happily so it was relatively quiet at night in the lobby where one of us was working, on US time.
Room Tip: Probably rooms on the busy street would be noisy. See more room tips Green Features: Good environmental policies - recycling, electricity use, reuse of towels etc.
